key.name: hide-on-unmaximized
key.summary: Hides title when there are no windows present.
key.description: When enabled, the title will disappear when there are no maximized (or active) windows on the screen.

key.name: only-maximized
key.description: When enabled, the window title will always display the upper-most maximized window's name.

key.name: swap-order
key.description: When enabled, window title will be on the left side and the icon on the right side.

key.name: expand-applet
key.description: When enabled, the applet will use up all available space in the panel.

key.name: hide-icon
key.description: When enabled, the window icon will not be displayed.

key.name: hide-title
key.description: When enabled, the window title will not be displayed.

key.name: show-tooltips
key.summary: Show tooltips over title and icon
key.description: When enabled, a tooltip carrying the name of the currently active window will be shown.

key.name: title-size
key.description: This size is used when the applet is not expanded or otherwise to determine the minimal size the title label can be shrunk to. The value represents the amount of pixels either in width or height, depending on the panel orientation.

key.name: custom-style
key.description: When enabled, custom font style and color will be used. When disabled, system theme defaults will be used.

key.name: show-window-menu
key.summary: Show the window action menu on right click.
key.description: Will cause the window action menu to appear when the title is right-clicked. This experimental feature is still under development! Warning! In current feature state you will be unable to access the applet action menu via title-right click when this option is enabled! You may still do so by right-clicking the icon if it is not hidden.

key.name: title-active-font
key.description: Font name and size for the active window state.

key.name: title-inactive-font
key.description: Font name and size for the inactive window state.

key.name: title-active-color-fg
key.description: Title foreground color in hex format for the active window state.

key.name: title-inactive-color-fg
key.description: Title foreground color in hex format for the inactive window state.
